start.text: Luck will be on our side, I'm sure of it. We'll succeed!
Don't get too nervous and just do it as we practiced!
I've got a good feeling that we'll make it!
We're fully prepared now. They don't scare us any more!
If I reroute things like this... Whoawhoawhoa, almost blew out the shields!

start_boss.text: That's... Scary, but I'm confident about this! Here they come!
Crew, trust me and follow my lead! We'll do this, I know we will!

retreat.text: It won't end like this, we're getting out of here!
Not good! We need to get out of here!

out_of_missiles.text: We're out of missiles? I thought we had more than that!
Uh-oh, we ran out of missiles!

engaged.text: Don't get too nervous, we'll get them!

need_help.text: Oh no! We need help, fast!

pursuing.text: Whoa, did you see that..? I got them there!
I'll take them down! Get back here!
They're running! Winning is just gonna be a matter of time!

running.text: Don't panic, everyone! We need to keep it together!
We got in over our heads, don't blame yourself!

hull_90.text: Stay calm everyone! It's not that bad!
Uh oh, they got some hits in!
My ship is taking damage, but I won't give up!

hull_50.text: Not good! The ship is in danger!

hull_30.text: No, I don't want it to end like this!
Now or never! Don't give up!

overload.text: Don't blame yourselves! We'll handle the overload soon!
Stay calm! Let the flux out..!

death.text: I thought I could do this much...
I didn't want it to end like this...
Am I really doing a good job...?

victory.text: Good work, everyone! We all finished the job nicely!
Let's retrieve the salvage and go back now!

victory_boss.text: We won, we really won! That means I helped, right?
